sentences.english: The Research and Application of User Interface in CAID System;
sentences.chinese: 用户界面旋钮型的直观且易于使用。

sentences.english: The cam member operably connects a temperature control knob to the thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 凸轮元件把一个温度控制旋钮可操作地连接于恒温器。

sentences.english: This knob is only held on by sellotape.
sentences.chinese: 这个旋钮只是用通明胶带牢固住的。

sentences.english: Turn the knob clockwise to switch the TV set on.
sentences.chinese: 将旋钮按顺时针方向转，打开电视机。

sentences.english: G. Insert the lock cylinder, making the key and knob run smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 插入锁芯，使钥匙及旋钮转动顺畅。

sentences.english: The user interface is knob-based for intuitive and easy use.
sentences.chinese: 用户界面旋钮型的直观且易于使用。

sentences.english: For light duty tension application with vibration-proof hand knob to give progressive spring thrust.
sentences.chinese: 轻型负荷张力应用于抗震手旋钮去给渐进式弹簧推力。

sentences.english: How many detents do we need in a hardware knob?
sentences.chinese: 一个硬件旋钮上我们需要多少销键？

sentences.english: The control panel comes in a dial or a digital display.
sentences.chinese: 控制面板有旋钮或按键式的。

sentences.english: Twist the knob to the right setting.
sentences.chinese: 把旋钮拧到适当的定位挡上。

sentences.english: In a facility near Taipei, he began making plastic channel-changing knobs for black-and-white television sets.
sentences.chinese: 一开始他在台北附近生产黑白电视机的塑料调频旋钮。

sentences.english: You may turn the right knob on the TV to switch it on.
sentences.chinese: 你可以拧电视上右边的旋钮把它打开。

sentences.english: Turn the knob all the way left, and the updates will be paused.
sentences.chinese: 一直往左旋转旋钮更新就会暂停。

sentences.english: What is knob and tube wiring?
sentences.chinese: 何为旋钮和管道式布线？

sentences.english: He twiddled a knob on the dashboard.
sentences.chinese: 他转动着仪表板上的一个旋钮。

sentences.english: The cutters are opened by turning the knob anticlockwise.
sentences.chinese: 逆时针转动旋钮可以开启切割机。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
glove compartment (of a car)/glovebox (sealed compartment with attached gloves for handling hazardous materials etc)
(in a manual car) gear (i.e. reverse, neutral, 1st, 2nd etc)/(automatic car) transmission mode (P, R, N, D etc)/(electric fan etc) speed setting
